pages.text: The $(mob)Enderman$() is a monster rarely found in dark places in the $(thing)Overworld$() and commonly found in the $(thing)End$(). It attacks players after being looked at by teleporting towards them and using melee attacks.$(p)It is vulnerable to $(thing)Water$() and flees when in contact with sunlight, but uses its teleportation abilities to dodge any projectiles thrown at it.
$(mob)Endermans$() drop $(item)Ender Pearls$() on death. These can be thrown to teleport the user where it lands, at the cost of some life.
